alert.note: Alert for Socorro (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 4:45PM MDT until September 26 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Socorro County in central New Mexico... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 444 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Socorro, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Socorro, San Antonio, Laborcita, and Luis Lopez. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 138 and 148. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 125 and 138. Highway 380 near Mile Marker 1. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
